00058 //_____ D E C L A R A T I O N S ____________________________________________
00059 
00060 //! Used to flag a report ready to send
00061 Bool  g_b_send_report;
00062 //! Used to flag a ack report ready to send
00063 Bool  g_b_send_ack_report;
00064 //! Used to store the HID mouse report
00065 U8    g_hid_mouse_report[4];
00066 #if (TARGET_BOARD==STK525)
00067 //! Used to store the HID mouse report
00068 U16 g_u16_pos_scroll;
00069 #endif
00070 //! Used to count the number of SOF and create a timer counter
00071 volatile U8 g_u8_cpt_sof;
00072 
00073 //! Reference level for steps, defined in sensors.c
00074 extern U8 Zerovalue[8];
00075 
00076 //_____ D E F I N I T I O N S _______________________________________________
00077 
00078 //! This function initializes the hardware/software resources required for mouse task.
00079 //!
00080 void mouse_task_init(void)
00081 {
00082    // Init SOF
00083    g_u8_cpt_sof=0;
00084    Usb_enable_sof_interrupt();
00085 
00086    // Init interface board
00087    Joy_init();
00088    Hwb_button_init();
00089    Leds_init();
00090    Led1_on();
00091    Led0_off();
00092 #if (TARGET_BOARD==STK525)
00093    init_adc();
00094    g_u16_pos_scroll=Get_adc_pot_val();
00095 #endif
00096 
00097    // Send a ack report at startup
00098    g_b_send_report      = FALSE;
00099    g_b_send_ack_report  = TRUE;
00100 
00101    // Set first zerovalue for calibrating sensor reading
00102    U8 i = 0;
00103    for(i = ADC_START_CHANNEL; i <= ADC_END_CHANNEL; i++) {
00104       if(i != 3) {
00105          Zerovalue[i] = adc_reader(i);
00106       }
00107    }
00108 }
00109 
00110 
00111 //! Task which links mouse events with the USB HID mouse device
00112 //!
00113 void mouse_task(void)
00114 {
00115    if(Is_usb_vbus_low())
00116    {
00117       Setup_power_down_mode();
00118       Sleep_instruction();
00119    }
00120 
00121    if(!Is_device_enumerated())
00122       return;  // Device not ready
00123 
00124 #if (USB_LOW_SPEED_DEVICE==DISABLE)
00125    // The SOF is used to schedule the task at the same frequency that Endpoint Interrupt frequency
00126    // This check allow to win a CPU time
00127    if(g_u8_cpt_sof<NB_IDLE_POLLING_SOF)
00128       return;  // Wait a delay
00129    g_u8_cpt_sof=0;
00130 #endif
00131 
00132    if(!g_b_send_report)
00133    {
00134       // No report sending on going, then check mouse event to eventualy fill a new report
00135       if(is_mouse_event())
00136       {
00137          // Enable sending of report
00138          g_b_send_report      = TRUE;
00139       }
00140    }
00141 
00142    if((!g_b_send_report)&&(!g_b_send_ack_report))
00143       return;  // No report and ack to send
00144 
00145    //** A report or ack must be send
00146    Usb_select_endpoint(EP_MOUSE_IN);
00147    if(!Is_usb_write_enabled())
00148       return;  // Endpoint no free
00149 
00150    Led0_on();
00151    if( g_b_send_report )
00152    {
00153       g_b_send_report      = FALSE;
00154       // Send an ack after a "clic" report only
00155       g_b_send_ack_report = (0!=g_hid_mouse_report[0]);
00156    }
00157    else
00158    {
00159       Hid_mouse_report_reset();     // Reset report to have a ack report
00160       g_b_send_ack_report  = FALSE;
00161    }
00162    // Send report
00163    Usb_write_byte(g_hid_mouse_report[0]);
00164    Usb_write_byte(g_hid_mouse_report[1]);
00165    Usb_write_byte(g_hid_mouse_report[2]);
00166    Usb_write_byte(g_hid_mouse_report[3]);
00167    Usb_ack_in_ready();
00168    Led0_off();
00169 }
00170 
00171 
00172 //! This function increments the SOF counter each times
00173 //!
00174 //! @verbatim
00175 //! the USB Start Of Frame interrupt subroutine is executed (1ms)
00176 //! Usefull to manage time delays
00177 //! @endverbatim
00178 //!
00179 void sof_action()
00180 {
00181    g_u8_cpt_sof++;
00182 }
00183 
00184 
00185 //! This function enables switches interruptions and enters the CPU in power down mode.
00186 //!
00187 //! @verbatim
00188 //! This function is executed when a suspend is received.
00189 //! @endverbatim
00190 //!
00191 void suspend_action(void)
00192 {
00193 #if (USB_REMOTE_WAKEUP_FEATURE == ENABLED)
00194    if (remote_wakeup_feature == ENABLED)
00195    {
00196       Switches_enable_it();
00197    }
00198    Led1_off();
00199    Enable_interrupt();
00200    Enter_power_down_mode();
00201    Led1_on();
00202 #endif
00203 }
00204 
00205 
00206 #if (USB_REMOTE_WAKEUP_FEATURE == ENABLED)
00207 //! This function exits the CPU of the power down mode and disables switches interruptions
00208 //!
00209 //! @verbatim
00210 //! This function is executed when a switche interruption is received
00211 //! @endverbatim
00212 //!
00213 #ifdef __GNUC__
00214 ISR(PCINT0_vect)
00215 #else
00216 #pragma vector = PCINT0_vect
00217 __interrupt void switch_event_int()
00218 #endif
00219 {
00220    Switches_disable_it();
00221    usb_generate_remote_wakeup();
00222 }
00223 #endif
